overview:
Serial Entrepreneur and Investor.

• 6x Entrepreneur. Founded and built 6 profitable companies.

• Founder of GetTaxi (Disrupt taxies market in Europe ($22B))

• Founder of Vigoda.ru (Russian “Groupon”, 94 cities, 260 ppl, est. revenues for 2012 are about $200M and profitable)

• Earlier spent 5 years in Silicon Valley. Founded Loyalize.com – Social TV company. Its Fortune 500 clients list includes: Motorolla, Yahoo7, Viacom/ MTV. Got acquired by FunctionX INC (FNCX:OTC US) - $1B public company - largest SocialTV player.

• Previously, CEO of public company Comverse [NASDAQ:CMVT] in Russian office Where achieved the record of $300M in total sales.

Additionally owns Private Investment Fund: investing in companies that are set to fundamentally change how existing industries operate.
